entity.mmec.footR.name: A Right Foot

entity.mmec.legR.name: Other Left Leg
entity.mmec.body.name: Definitely Not A Turkey Body

entity.mmec.wingR.name: Not The Left Wing

mightyenderchicken.config.prop.enderChic: What are the enabled skills for the Ender Chicken
mightyenderchicken.config.prop.chaosChic: What are the enabled skills for the Chaos Chicken
mightyenderchicken.config.prop.enderChic: This item spawns the ender chicken. Mod items are supported.
mightyenderchicken.config.prop.chaosChic: This item spawns the chaos chicken. Mod items are supported.
mightyenderchicken.config.prop.scaleEnde: What should the scale of the Ender Chicken be? (x 0.1)
mightyenderchicken.config.prop.scaleChao: What should the scale of the Chaos Chicken be? (x 0.1)
mightyenderchicken.config.prop.healthEnd: What should the health of the Ender Chicken be? (x scale)
mightyenderchicken.config.prop.healthCha: What should the health of the Chaos Chicken be? (x scale)
mightyenderchicken.config.prop.maxSkills: Maximum number of skills that the Ender Chicken can use at once. (The Chaos Chicken has no cap)
mightyenderchicken.config.prop.chickensI: Are the chickens immune to fire?
mightyenderchicken.config.prop.laserSpaw: Does the chickens' laser spawn dragon's breath?
mightyenderchicken.config.prop.chaosChic: What is the skill chance multiplier for the Chaos Chicken? (in %)
The Chaos Chicken has some special damages that pierces armor. This is a multiplier for it. (in %)
mightyenderchicken.config.prop.spawnSpec: Should the chicken only be allowed to spawn in a specific dimension?
The specific dimension for the chicken to be spawned in.
mightyenderchicken.config.prop.minHitsRe: The minimum number of hits required to kill the chicken.
mightyenderchicken.config.prop.flapChanc: What is the chance of the chicken flapping to push away entities? (in 0.1%)
mightyenderchicken.config.prop.laserChan: What is the chance of the chicken firing its laser? (in 0.1%)
mightyenderchicken.config.prop.eggBreaks: Number of breaks the chicken requires to break out of the egg
mightyenderchicken.config.prop.eggBombMi: How long should the egg bomb be alive for, minimum (in ticks)
mightyenderchicken.config.prop.eggBombMa: How long should the egg bomb be alive for, maximum (in ticks)
mightyenderchicken.config.prop.eggBombSp: Speed of the egg bomb in flight
mightyenderchicken.config.prop.eggBombEx: Scale of the egg bomb's explosion (in %)
mightyenderchicken.config.prop.strafingR: How long should a strafing run be, minimum (in ticks)
How long should a strafing run be, maximum (in ticks)
What is the chance of an egg bomb spawning, per tick? (in %)
What is the chance of of an egg bomb flying towards the player? (in %)
What is the chance of the chicken doing a strafing run (in 0.1%)
mightyenderchicken.config.prop.chargeWar: What should the charging warn time be for the chicken (when smoke is emitting from the bill) (in ticks)
mightyenderchicken.config.prop.chargeDis: At what distance should the charge cancel? (in blocks)
mightyenderchicken.config.prop.chargingC: What is the chance of the chicken charging? (in 0.1%)
mightyenderchicken.config.prop.clearArea: The clear area ability uses a custom explosion class. The ExplosionEvent.Detonate event will only be fired if this is turned on. FTBUtilities requires this event to protect against explosions. Bear in mind, I am triggering this explosion when the chicken thinks it is stuck. If FTBUtilities prevents the blocks from being destroyed by this explosion, the chicken will get trapped in an explosion loop.
What is the chance of the chicken to clear the area? (in 0.1%)
mightyenderchicken.config.prop.regenerat: What is the cooldown before the chicken can try and regenerate its forcefield? (in ticks)
What is the chance of the chicken to regenerate its forcefield? (in 0.1%)
mightyenderchicken.config.prop.spinningC: What is the chance of the chicken to spin attack? (in 0.1%)
mightyenderchicken.config.prop.forcefiel: What item should be used to break the forcefield. Use "null" to allow any melee attack to break it.
mightyenderchicken.config.prop.targetAll: Should the ender chicken be allowed to target all entities (other than the player)?
mightyenderchicken.config.prop.slowpokeE: Enable the easter egg written for Slowpoke when he plays with the chickens?
subtitles.mmec.chaos_intro_1: I've been waiting for this time to come.
subtitles.mmec.chaos_intro_2: There's no future for you people.
subtitles.mmec.chaos_intro_3: Your fate is in our hands.
text.chicken.attack_with_stick: G'day mate. Y'all s'pposed to whack dem chicky tendies' glowing ball with some %s, y'hear?
text.chicken.attack_misconfigured: Hang on dere matey. Yerr config's kinda broke, so you can't break the forcefield at all! Good luck survivin'
text.chicken.no_infinity: The %1$s does not kill. The %1$s heals.
death.attack.chicken_charge_body: %1$s tried to chest bump a chicken. %1$s failed.
death.attack.laser.player: %1$s saw a bright light, and beyond it, was %2$s.
